testcase.name: Given "John" is viewing the landing page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Should be able to search for a product from the drop-down menu

testcase.name: And he mouses over Clothing & Shoes label on the landing page and click Womens from the drop down
testcase.classname: Scenario: Should be able to search for a product from the drop-down menu

testcase.name: And he selects Dresses from the women clothing down menu
testcase.classname: Scenario: Should be able to search for a product from the drop-down menu

testcase.name: Then he sees total number "(381,309 items)" of products displayed on the landing page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Should be able to search for a product from the drop-down menu

testcase.name: Given "John" is viewing the landing page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Should be able to search for a product from the icons

testcase.name: When he clicks Jewellery & Accessories label on the landing page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Should be able to search for a product from the icons

testcase.name: And he again clicks ALL JEWELLERIES & ACCESSORIES from the drop down
testcase.classname: Scenario: Should be able to search for a product from the icons
